entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 24 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:40 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
